US states have enacted 1,381 abortion restrictions since Roe v. Wade was decided in 1973



Roe v. Wade was overturned by the US Supreme Court on June 24, 2022. When Roe v. Wade was the law of the land, state lawmakers still enacted 1,381 abortion restrictions between 1973 and June 21, 2022.
